Loved it! Taste awesome and the portion is generous, although the bowl look kinda small. We ordered the set meal for 2 and find it most value for money. As there are not many tables, advisable to visit during odd hour. Highly recommended.
Awesome food and reasonably priced, shop is abit small but sufficient for small group, love the unagi and salmon. Mentaiko serving is sufficient too

Cute little place serving fresh sashimi on rice with lots of sides to choose from as well. The  small number of seats really make it feel like eating in Japan. Good value for money based on the portion sizes.
